QuestData.Title: Signal Boost
QuestData.Description: The Skyfire's starboard propeller came to rest on the cliffs overlooking our camp - we're gonna use it like a big antenna and push our distress signal so far that even Mekkatorque's alarm clock could pick it up!$B$BUnfortunately, it might attract some unwanted attention.$B$BWe're braced for enemy contact down here at the camp - fire up that signal and be ready to defend the antenna!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Skyfire Propeller to broadcast a distress signal, then hold out until help arrives.
QuestData.RewardText: The distress signal got through. We'll be evacuated to Greywatch immediately.$B$BI'm afraid that, for now, you will have to continue on your mission without us. Once we are settled, I will send out recon patrols to see if we can glean the location of the Aegis.$B$BYou must secure the Aegis of Aggramar if we are to drive back the Legion threat!
